issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Rename ExpressionVisitor --> ExprVisitor and standardize input
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11711](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11711). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rename ExpressionVisitor ExprVisitor for consistency and change it to use `&mut self` rather than consuming the visitor for consistency with `PlanVisitor` (as well as the soon to be created `ExprVisitor`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11711?focusedCommentId=17332385) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/181
